analysis.key_quote: To modify this section and provide the ‘At will’ employment versus the ‘9.4%’ option to newly hired employees would be reasonable.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the implications of changing employment protections for current federal employees, emphasizing the importance of the commitments made during recruitment and the potential negative impact on job security. This aligns with opposition to the proposed rule, particularly regarding due process and merit-based employment.
